label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_008
content:

### Events
- Weekend lower traffic: executed planned cleanup of expired refresh tokens older than retention threshold; verified counts match policy.
- Closed one long-running access exception after manager attestation completed in GRC tool.
- Reviewed SAML assertion errors; 4 tied to users with outdated browser time settings; added KB article.
- Validated audit pipeline drop rate; remained under alert threshold with improved backpressure settings.
